data.author: ReasonableTeeth

changelog.release_notes: Changes to decrease window load time.
Removed rotation of SHIELD badge in attempt to fix bug where watchface would not load on actual Pebble Time hardware.

Initial release. Issue updating battery/bluetooth indicators from event callbacks on emulator (needs testing on Pebble Time/Time Steel). Effect of constantly spinning logo on battery-life also needs testing.

data.description:
Look like a real agent of the Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division with this Agents Of S.H.I.E.L.D. watchface!

Outer ring shows hours, inner ring shows minutes. Date, bluetooth and battery complications also visible.

Please note that this watchface is a work in progress, and is as-yet untested on actual hardware (Pebble Time/Pebble Time Steel), so please let me know if you have any issues and I will try to address them as soon as possible.

latest_release.release_notes: Changes to decrease window load time.

data.title: Agents Of SHIELD
